participant_1.background:
My first paycheck bought me a soccer ball and my time is too valuable for Comic Con.
I wake up and greet my pets with a smile.
i like to ride my bike.
i am former military.
i am a wife.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy picking wild strawberries with my son on our weekend camping trips.
I am a hard worker, and I don't let my height get in the way of my work.
Others will be inspired by my work and see that it is possible to make a living doing what you love, even if you didn't go to college.
i used to wear a cape.
my guilty pleasure is mcdonald.

content.text: Doing okay!  What is your favorite thing to do on the weekend?
I love to spend time with my pets!  What about you?
That sounds great! I like to spend time with my son and pick wild strawberries on our weekend camping trips.
Oh that sounds fun! I have never been camping before.
I would recommend it! It is a great way to get outdoors and enjoy nature.
I'll have to give it a try sometime.  What are some other things you like to do?
I also enjoy working hard and being creative.  I'm a hard worker and I don't let my height get in the way of my work.
That is great!  I am also a hard worker and I love to be creative.
I think that is awesome!  I hope that others will be inspired by my work and see that it is possible to make a living doing what you love, even if you didn't go to college.
That is a great goal and I hope you achieve it!  What is your guilty pleasure?
My guilty pleasure is McDonald's!  I love their french fries.
I have to admit, I love McDonald's fries too!
We should go on a camping trip together sometime!  We can pick wild strawberries and enjoy McDonald's fries!
That sounds like a great idea!  I would love to go camping with you
